document.full_text: a judge on friday rejected an indicted securities trader's request to postpone his insider trading trial because of the broadly publicized conviction of hedge fund manager raj rajaratnam in the same new york court.
document.title: judge rejects insider trading trial delay
lines_and_colors: a judge on friday rejected an indicted securities trader's request to postpone his insider trading trial because of the broadly publicized conviction of hedge fund manager raj rajaratnam in the same new york court.
